snippet.title: Review: Dell’s acrobatic XPS 12 is the Windows 8 convertible to beat
snippet.description: ...For better or worse, Windows 8 has prompted some of the most adventuresome PC designs we've seen in years. Many of these are trying to capitalize on both of the new operating systems facesthe new touch-oriented Start screen and its apps on one, and the classic desktop environment on the other.Most of these computers are either good laptops but questionable tablets (the Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 13...
